text: #YFEchat I loved it! Will end on this - I thought we were workaholics til I went to Korea. Those women work like 7AM-11PM. Ugh.

text: #YFEchat In SIlicon Valley they call it the "merge" Life and work always happening all at once. Its exhilirating but so exhausting
author: HannaRosin

text: #YFEchat key is to open our minds to new roles, not flinch when we see man at park with kids on a Tuesday, woman asking for a raise
author: HannaRosin

text: #YFEchat End of Men means more end of macho, end of total male domination, start of a new historical era where women can lead
author: HannaRosin

text: #YFEchat so Michelle Obama is health care exec while Barack goes to law school and does public service, then she switches to mom in chief
author: HannaRosin

text: #YFEchat see saw means men and women can switch places, play different roles in a marriage over time
author: HannaRosin

text: #YFEchat I put a lot o stock in the seesaw marriages. They seem to be making men and women much happier. No one stuck in any one role.
